mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.class_name, c.teacher, c.description, c.create_time, c.update_time, COUNT(s.id) AS student_count FROM class c LEFT JOIN student s ON c.id = s.class_id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.id DESC
SELECT c.id, c.class_name, c.teacher, c.description, c.create_time, c.update_time, COUNT(s.id) AS student_count FROM class c LEFT JOIN student s ON c.id = s.class_id WHERE c.id = #{id} GROUP BY c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class (class_name, teacher, description, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{className}, #{teacher}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE class SET class_name = #{className}, teacher = #{teacher}, description = #{description}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
